getStarted.carousel01_text: Predict illnesses, track health trends, and store your journey securely - all in one place.
getStarted.carousel02_text: Track and protect your entire family's health with ease and confidence every day.
getStarted.carousel03_text: Access your full health history and future - smart, secure, and always available.

home.What is Diabetesans: Diabetes is a long-term condition where the body cannot properly produce or use insulin, resulting in high blood sugar levels.
home.What is Hypertensionans: Hypertension is when the blood pressure in the arteries stays too high for too long, raising the risk of heart disease and stroke.
home.What is Coronary artery diseaseans: Coronary artery disease (CAD) occurs when heart arteries narrow due to plaque buildup, significantly increasing heart attack risk.
home.What is StrokeAns: Stroke is when blood flow to the brain is blocked or ruptured, often causing brain damage and impairing vital functions.

about.Your Partner in Personalized Health & We: Your Partner in Personalized Health & Wellness
about.About Description: Medpredit is a self-assessment healthcare app designed to help individuals and families monitor health parameters like stress, sleep, BMI, diet, and more. Empower yourself with personalized insights and manage family wellness from one place.
about.YourPartner: Your Partner in Personalized Health & Wellness
about.Description: Medpredit is a user-friendly self-assessment healthcare app designed to empower you to take control of your well-being. Whether you're aiming to improve your lifestyle or simply want a clearer understanding of your health, Medpredit provides valuable insights.

ComprehensiveCare.Title: Comprehensive Care
ComprehensiveCare.Desc: Evaluate your wellness in key areas like Stress, Alcohol Use, Sleep Quality, and Tobacco Usage to gain a detailed view of potential health risks.

BasicCare.Title: Basic Care
BasicCare.Desc: Assess your Diet, BMI, Physical Activity, and Family Medical History. These foundational checks help you monitor your day-to-day health.

FamilyHealthManagement.Title: Family Health Management
FamilyHealthManagement.Desc: Add and manage family member profiles easily. Monitor and support their wellness journeys together with your own.

about.MissionStatement: At Medpredit, we believe in health awareness and preventive care. We aim to inspire healthy choices and provide accessible tools for your entire family.
about.CallToAction: Download Medpredit and begin your journey to better health today!

terms.IntroductionAns: Welcome to MedPredit, a digital health and wellness platform that provides personalized self-assessments based on categories such as Stress, Alcohol, Tobacco, Dietary, BMI, Physical Activity, and Family History. By accessing or using the MedPredit application, you agree to the following Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully.
terms.Acceptance of Terms Ans: By using MedPredit, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, our Privacy Policy, and any additional terms that may apply. If you do not agree, you must not use our services.
terms.Services Provided Ans 1: MedPredit offers health-related self-assessments. Users can select categories and complete self-assessments to receive personalized insights and wellness scores.
terms.Services Provided Ans 2: MedPredit does not provide medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. The insights and scores generated are for informational and educational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice.
terms.Registration and Account Ans: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and ensuring the accuracy of your provided information.
terms.Subscription and Payments Ans 1: First 2 self-assessments are provided for free; others require a paid subscription.
terms.Subscription and Payments Ans 2: Subscription details, pricing, and renewal terms will be clearly provided before purchase.
terms.Subscription and Payments Ans 3: Payments are processed securely via third-party payment gateways.
terms.Subscription and Payments Ans 4: By subscribing, you authorize us to charge your selected payment method as per your chosen plan.
terms.Subscription and Payments Ans 5: Subscriptions are non-refundable unless otherwise required by law.
terms.Privacy and Data Ans: We are committed to protecting your privacy. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for details on how we collect, use, and protect your data.
terms.User Conduct Point 1: Misuse the services or interfere with their functionality.
terms.User Conduct Point 2: Attempt to access or collect data from other users.
terms.User Conduct Point 3: Use the platform to transmit harmful, offensive, or illegal content.
terms.Disclaimer Point 1: MedPredit is not a medical service provider. The app is intended for informational use only.
terms.Disclaimer Point 2: We do not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of the insights or scores.
terms.Disclaimer Point 3: We are not liable for any decisions or actions you take based on the information provided through the app.
terms.Intellectual Property Ans: All content, trademarks, logos, and data on MedPredit are the property of MedPredit or its licensors. You may not reproduce, distribute, or exploit any part of the platform without prior written consent.
terms.Contact Us Ans: If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms, please contact us at:
terms.Refund Policy Ans 1: No Refunds: We do not offer refunds or credits for any partial usage, unused time, or uncompleted self-assessments, regardless of the reason.
terms.Refund Policy Ans 2: Non-transferable: Subscriptions and purchases are linked to your account and are non-transferable.
terms.Refund Policy Ans 3: Cancellation: Once a subscription is purchased, it cannot be cancelled, and no refunds will be issued for any reason.

privacy.IntroductionDesc1: Welcome to Medpredit ("we," "our," or "us"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal and health-related information when you use our self-assessment health app ("App").
privacy.IntroductionDesc2: By using the App, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use the App.
privacy.Name: Name
privacy.Lifestyle-related data: Lifestyle-related data (e.g., physical activity, tobacco use, stress, sleep, BMI, diet)
privacy.Use 1: To deliver personalized health insights and self-assessments.
privacy.Use 2: To store and analyze your responses to health questionnaires.
privacy.DisclosureDesc: We do not sell your personal or health data. We may share information only under the following circumstances:
privacy.With providers: With healthcare providers, only with your explicit consent, to provide health-related services and support.
privacy.With authorities: With legal authorities, if required by law.
privacy.Confidentiality: Your data is handled with strict confidentiality.
privacy.SecurityDesc: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including:
privacy.Strict access controls: Strict access controls and cryptographic key protection.
privacy.No system secure: However, no system is completely secure. Please use the App responsibly.
privacy.Access or update: Access or update your personal information.
privacy.Request data: Request a copy of your data.
privacy.Contact to exercise rights: To exercise these rights, please contact us at:
privacy.Third-party disclaimer: The app may contain links to third-party services used specifically for processing payments. Please note that we are not responsible for the privacy practices or policies of these external services.
privacy.Policy updates: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. The latest version will always be available on our platform. Significant changes will be communicated to you.
privacy.Contact info:
For questions or concerns, contact:
Zadroit IT Solutions.
